description: Coverage.py - Measure, collect, and report on code coverage in Python programs.

annotate.name: annotate
annotate.summary: Annotate source files with execution information.

combine.name: combine
combine.summary: Combine a number of data files.

debug.name: debug
debug.summary: Display information about the internals of coverage.py

json.name: json
json.summary: Create a JSON report of coverage results.

lcov.name: lcov
lcov.summary: Create an LCOV report of coverage results.

run.name: run
run.summary: Run a Python program and measure code execution.

xml.name: xml
xml.summary: Create an XML report of coverage results.

notes: Use "coverage help <command>" for detailed help on any command.
